title: Rioter plz read its urgent!!!!!!!!!!!
body:
so the 3 icons right are meant to give the chests 
so i got two of them with ip and got my chests my mate gifted me the last one and i didnt get a chest
now i looked at the gifting page it cleary shows the icon and the box now i cant get my ashe boarder cos i cant buy rp got gifted skin plz riot just give me the pink box i have the icon and no box plz riot plz im a fan of the boarders and i just want the ashe one

PLEASE RIOT PLEASE

replies.body: You should send a Player Support Ticket to Riot and wait for reply. Do not send multiple Riot Tickets as doing so can make your ticket take longer to be read unless you have extra information to dish out to them.
hey man if you haven't received a chest that you should have, your best bet is to get in touch with player support - http://support.riotgames.com/
